Author: Suck-Less
Text: I’ve been in great shape, obese, and I’m in pretty good shape now. I’ve gone through the full range over the decades.  Remember, BMI is a guide, not a law. Every bodybuilder you see, everyone that is close to the Adonis Ratio has a high BMI. Why? Because muscle weights more than fat. Waist size is a more accurate guide IMO.  You shouldn’t be ashamed at all. Just remember, we are always going somewhere. We are in a constant state of either getting healthier or in worse shape. Do your best to be heading in the direction of where you want to end up as.

Author: papira_ul
Text: Bmi is just a number. It could be anything and we would probably still feel the same way. I've stopped weighing myself because I hate looking at the number. You should try it too ▼・ᴥ・▼
